thread.title: Office's Post-It super heroes cleared using leaf blower | Weird News
thread.title_full: Office's Post-It super heroes cleared using leaf blower | Weird News | ArcaMax Publishing

author: arcamax.com
title: Office's Post-It super heroes cleared using leaf blower | Weird News
text:
SAN FRANCISCO (UPI) -- A man who decorated his company's San Francisco office with Post-It murals of super heroes shared video of the murals being cleared with a leaf blower.
Ben Brucker, 31, whose time-lapse video of 11 office workers putting the super hero murals on the walls of the office went viral in April, posted a follow-up video to YouTube Sunday showing how the Post-Its were cleared from the walls.
The new video shows office workers using a leaf blower to blast Post-It likenesses of heroes including Iron Man, Wonder Woman, Captain America, the Scarlet Witch, Spider-Man, Superman and Batman off the walls.
The video ends with the notes being cleared from the walls and the floor.
"Back to work," text on the screen reads.
"[Four] months and 1 leaf blower later, the Post-Its had to come down. Nothing lasts forever..." Brucker wrote in the video's description.
Brucker said he masterminded the plan in early April to dress up the drab walls of his company's office.
"I wanted us to feel like the space was truly ours, and for us to enjoy it," Brucker told ABC News. It's nice to have some of our personality and creativity reflected in the space.
